casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Basil Suer (9281)

Foti, Landau and Heiman, Js.

Argued September 12 decision released October 1, 1991 Cindy J. Arenberg and Rhonda J. Tobin, special public defenders, for the appellant (defendant). Paul J. Ferencek, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were JohnM. Bailey, state’s attorney, and Warren Maxwell, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
